alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Greene, northeastern Craighead, northwestern Mississippi, southeastern Clay and southern Dunklin Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 515 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Leachville, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kennett, Manila, Leachville, Senath, Cardwell, Hornersville, Arbyrd, Greenway, Nimmons, Jolliff Store, Happy Corners, Delfore, Macey, Fritz, Buckeye, Mounds, Arkmo, West Kennett, Leonard and Pawheen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
